item.title: New GitHub API endpoint for repository statistics
item.dc:creator: github-actions[bot]
item.description: A brief description of the new API endpoint
item.content:encoded:
New Repository Statistics API

We are excited to announce a new API endpoint for accessing repository statistics.

This new endpoint allows developers to:

  • Access commit frequency data over time
  • View contributor statistics
  • Track code size changes

For more information, see the API documentation.

item.title: Improved workflow dispatch events
item.dc:creator: github-actions[bot]
item.description: Workflow dispatch events now support additional payload options
item.content:encoded:
Enhanced workflow_dispatch Events

GitHub Actions now supports enhanced payload options for manually triggered workflows.

New features include:

  • Support for complex JSON payloads
  • Improved validation of inputs
  • Better error reporting

These improvements make it easier to pass complex data to your workflows when triggering them manually.
